tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
During my pregnancy period I did not know whom to contact as gynaecologist and obstrectics.
My mom referred  me  to Dr. Sukhamoy Barik  . The very first day of my meeting with the Dr. Barik I was simply impressed with his down to earth welcoming behaviour. After 30 weeks of pregnancy my case got complicated as the BP shoot up He guided me all through this difficult period of preterm and high BP to smooth delivery of my twin. His is a rare  combination of high skill and professionalism with amicable behaviour . In his extreme schedule he has enough time to  listen the patient‚Äôs problem and quarries with a broad smile. It‚Äôs a blessing to come across with  such a wonderful  Doctor as well as a person in a difficult time. May God bless him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *********** ** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ******* * He deals with his patients with great care and patience. His ways are simple and effective. My complete pregnancy journey was very smooth under Dr Barik's consultation. He was always available on phone in case of any emergency. My c section delivery was also very smooth and perfect . Post pregnancy too his advice and suggestions were very valuable to me . I am happy I chose him for the delivery of my first baby and his expertise, friendly nature and such caring attitude towards his patients are certainly some of the rarest combination in today's doctors. At last a big thank you Sir for making this journey so smooth and perfect.
reply_text: Thank you Shruti for such a nice feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am a PCOS patient .. before Dr. Barik i consulted many doctor's but almost every doctor was judgemental and very rude...after a lot of searching i got him ... And consulted him... He is the best doctor i have ever seen .. he listened to mee and my problems very peacefully and calmly. He even explained all the problems why i was facing those ... And given mee some medicines and tests to do ...i consulted him for the first time .. hope to visit him for my further treatments... Btw you  can consult him without any hesitation... ** ***** ** ** *** ***** donot think twice. 
 Thanks to Dr. Barik and practo !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ** *** **** ********** ****** *** ** ****** ** ********* ****** * A wonderful person .. 

Wanted to do delivery from a nearby good hospital ,but our previous doctor was not available in nearby hospital , this is how we met him , He is so polite , So humble , Very Friendly , Very Respectful , And he did his best before and after pregnancy , He does his delivery at Charnoc , Tulip , Spandan ,Binayak, north point and Neotia , and we did it from Neotia hospital  and It was excellent experience .. 


Thank you so much for this lovely gift and So humble behaviour , We are really blessed to got treatments from him

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Myself govt employee native of kolkata and presently posted at remote area of assam. For govt employee there is option of CGHS under which Charnok hospital empaneled and  dr barik is gynecologist who looking the same, so myself decided that form pregnancy till before delivery myself send my patient for OPD to his private chamber at dumdum and will pay full consultency fee. My wife regularly visited for 8 months, when 8th months completed once a day she felt that liquid are coming for slightly she rushed to him for checkup and dr barik suggested that it is emergency so urself go to any  govt hospital. Myself contacted him on same day for understandings the matter(05th nov 2020) he tell me that its emergency i will not do operation at ni8 so go to any govt hospital. Our family become panic and she was not  ready to admit in govt hospital so consulated to two different doctor for 2nd opinion. Both said its not so emergency myself can wait for couple of day.  Myself very next morning take flight and rushed to kolkata, contacted to charnock hospital (due to CGHS empaneled). Due to corona pandamic hospital r admitting only after Covid test.So myself decided that it batter to admit to charnok hospital (CGHS empaneled)to avoide any emergency and cost.
Hospital denied me to take admit with saying that the dr barik didn't intimated to hospital,after making nos of contact dr and lisane with hospital they aggred and take sample for covid. After 3hrs hospital tell that ur patient is +ve and they will not admit. I make call to dr barik but his assistant picked the ph and tell dr is bussy. And hospital asked me that here is option of covid delivery but that would take 6.5 lakh.Dr was well aware that myself in planing to take deliver under CGHS pakage rate i.e.off only 11000 (incl hospital and medical bill) he ******* do regular OPD as per his pvt charge 700 in each visit and at last moment ********** ** denied .  My self took wife to home and called to RB diagnostic and dr patholab for covid sampel on 7th nov. Both results come -ve.myself whats app the report of +ve and -ve to dr barik,but he didn't respond.myself try to contact dr nos of time but he didn't respond. Then myself contact to other pvt doctors and pvt ***** hospital and they conduct scissor and got baby girl **** ***** **** ** *** ** ******* ****** ****** ** ******** *** ******** ****** *** **** **I have all bill  prescription and covit +ve and -ve test report of same patient in my proof.
reply_text:
Mr Vikash
I have gone through your feedback. Your previous baby delivered under me one year back in CGHS rate at Charnock Hospital. Still you have used some offensive words against me without knowing the actual fact. No issue. That might be your nature. 
I think i should clarify few things. 

Firstly: My Consultation fees in my private chamber is not 700 (Too much), you should better ask your wife. Even i didn't take any fees from your wife during last visit . Don't you know that?¬† 

Second: Hospital authority has full right whether they will admit CGHS covid patient or not. Doctor has no right . They can only treat the patient. 

Third: Ask your wife, she know why i told her to get admitted. Opinion may vary from doctor to doctor. Nothing is universal. 

Lastly:¬† I don't know where you get the figure 6.5lacs. I do LSCS of Covid patient at Charnock Hospital regularly.¬† Cost is maximum one fifth of your quoted amount. 

(N.B: Check any hospital bill. You will get the information how much a doctor get out the bill amount)

If you really want to criticize me , it is welcomed.¬† But don't fabricate the truth.
Stay healthy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: my wife was in her ultimate stage of her last trimester and she was also suffering from uti fever. We tried to consult the top doctors of north Kolkata but they offered little help iterating just one condition to undergo corona test before even listening/analysing  anything. Dr. sukhomoy barik  listened our case patiently ,guided and helped us in admission in 2 different hospitals ( one for fever and other for delivery) during the peak corona time. Today i am blessed with a lovely healthy child. I am really indebted by his efforts and deeds. Lastly , i would like to mention his  soft, helpful and approachable behaviour  which induces confidence in a patient's mind even in a overbearing complex situation. God bless you sir.
reply_text: Thank you Chinmoy for such a positive feedback. I simply do the job in my way. At the end of the battle you get a beautiful princess.  That is the achievement of our team effort. Stay healthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi This is Pushpal Ganguly husband of Mrs Tumpa Ganguly his patient.  What to say I dont find words to explain him or thank him, Such a nice human being as well a wonderful Doctor who always understand patients problem and make them feel free to communicate with him. we are blessed with a baby girl under his delivery and treatment on 22nd May 2020 at Binayak Hospital and we are so satisfied with his treatment .  Only thing to share is my Wife still having pain in stitches area of ceser though still she under rest. so surely will visit him again regarding that for consultation. Rest we are all fully happy with his treatment & last nor the least Thanks to Dr Barik for giving us such a wonderful 1st Anniversary Gift :)  ( Our baby born on 22nd May and Our Anniversary was on 29th May )
reply_text: Thank you very much for such compliment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Diseases in Pregnancy, Prenatal Care,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
Dr. Sukhomoy Barik is an incredible doctor! When I found out I was pregnant I started searching for a gynaec on Practo.  The reviews and ratings were so good that we decide to book an appointment with him. I must say it‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. He is one of those few doctors who encourages his patients to give a try for NVD which is again very rare practice in West Bengal. At the last stage of my pregnancy I was diagnosed with Obstetric Cholestasis; My sgot sgpt levels were so high that I had to deliver my baby via c section. I was very nervous about the whole process because I always wanted to deliver my baby naturally. Dr. Barik explained the whole process and helped me to overcome my anxiety about the situation. 

Finally, I just want to say ‚Äî 
Dear Dr. Barik, Thank you for your guidance and help to bring our little bundle of joy to this world. Thank you for listening to all those queries and never being impatient answering any. That parting gift (a laminated photo of me and my baby soon after delivery) you gave us was a great gesture. God bless you and your family!
reply_text: Thank you Poulami for such a positive review.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've never met a doctor who is this much approachable and humble. he took time to review all my past medical histories , he explained my problems to me, he just didn't dictate what should be done , he was genuinely showing interest in a friendly conversation and that's unusual. all the best doctor. you deserve moreüëç
reply_text: Thank you Piya madam for your feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He is one of my favourite doctor.I am sure his behaviour and experience will touch everyone's heart.My journey from 1st day of consultation to final date of delivery with a healthy baby was awesome,which I can't express in word neither the Doctor nor to anyone else.

Always I do refer my friends and relatives to this doctor.I know they will be in a good hand.

Thanks & Regards
Sk Muntashir Al Aman
Rumaisa Zaman

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Barik is very friendly. He knows the subject. Always listen to the patient. I had gone Caesarean section last weeks. No pain after operation. I walked from the next day and came back home in 3 days. I am very happy with his treatment. He has fantastic surgical hands. I strongly recommend any pregnant patient to Dr Barik
reply_text: Thank you Dipika for your feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for second opinion as my doctor advised for caesarean section. He did a USG from a centre at nagerbazar and told me for Normal delivery can be done if I take a risk. I delivers normally  1 month back. Nothing happened. He was beside me all time. ** ** ****** * **** ******* I think only gynaecologist who motivates for normal delivery in Private chamber. 
Cons: He charged more for normal delivery than Caesarean section as he has to stay more time in hospital. 

Second He does normal delivery for CASH patient. I had CGHS scheme. He denied. I admitted in Neotia hospital without CGHS facility. But overall I am happy by his treatment. I recommend all mother who wants normal delivery to Dr Barik whom you can trust.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited doctor as he has very good review. I wanted for normal delivey as my previous doctor denied. When I met Dr Barik my impression was beyond my expectation. He has realy a friendly attitude whom I can trust. I admitted at mid night with labour pain and doctor was beside me till morning when i deliverd my baby. Whole time he encouraged me. Although he charged 40000 as his fees (a bit high), but I am satisfied by his supporting nature. No doctor would satand beside me whole night. Thank you Dr Barik.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When my wife got pregnancy, we went  to a most popular doctor at our north kolkata. It was too tough to get a appointment of the doctor. When we visited the doctor, he had in harry and we had many queries which was not cleared. So We were not satisfied.


Then we found Dr. Sukhamoy barik in Practo. At the first Day we meet, we are really surprised and satisfied. He discussed all about our query and very very polite behaviour. Many times we call him for different issue, he gave us suggestion and discussed about different query.  

My wife admitted at a nursing home with care of  Dr. Sukhamoy Barik, He was very much careful about Mother and baby. Now my baby and wife both are well. 

Also I found that Dr. Sukhamoy Barik is very gentle person. He always try to reduce unnecessary cost so that patient party feel comfort. 

Good bless him.
reply_text: Thank you very much for such compliment

review: I visited Dr. Barik for my bleeding problems during pregnancy, Sir, not only confirmed my miscarriage but he did not give me any unnecessary medicine which many of doctors preferred. In less than a 60 mins he tested every necessary test and saved our time. I must prefer him to others for their any gynae problems. He is very gentle and soft spoken doctor. Thank you Sir, for solving my problems..

review: Its been almost 1 year since birth of my daughter. My wife didn't had any problem post delivery.  There was slight hiccup as baby was not moving as expected. But Dr Barik took every precaution for this. The c-section delivery was smooth. Dr Barik never suggested any unnecessary medicine or test. That's what we like the most about Dr Barik. Both of us are very happy with all the experience we had with Dr Barik as doctor of our 1st child.
